actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to include Department of Energy couriers and security inspectors within the same civil service retirement provisions as law enforcement officers and firefighters.

summary.text: Gives Department of Energy (DOE) couriers and security inspectors the same civil service retirement benefits as law enforcement officers and firefighters. Defines "couriers" as any DOE employee who provides security during shipment of nuclear weapons components and strategic quantities of special nuclear materials. Defines "security inspector" as any DOE employee who protects nuclear weapons components and strategic quantities of special nuclear materials.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to include Department of Energy couriers and security inspectors within the same civil service retirement provisions as law enforcement officers and firefighters.
